resources.string: This is an unofficial application to Pokémon. I am not affiliated with Nintendo, in any manner. Neither Nintendo, nor anyone else has authorized, sponsored or sanctioned this unofficial application. All characters, names, places and events and all other aspects concerning Pokémon are property of their respective owners. All trademark and copyright concerning Pokémon are property of their respective owners. I make no claim to and do not have any rights to any of the foregoing. In creating this unofficial application to Pokémon, I assert its rights under the “fair use” doctrine pursuant to United States copyright law and the equivalent in other jurisdictions. If you believe that there has been a contravention of your proprietary rights, then email details to renzo.crisostomo@me.com.
